translations: n.[细胞]肝细胞（hepatocyte 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Superparamagnetic magnetite nanoparticles were surface-modified with lactobionic acid (LA) to improve their intracellular uptake and ability to target hepatocytes.
sentences.translation: 超顺磁性磁铁矿纳米粒子用乳糖酸（LA）进行了表面修饰，以提高其细胞内摄取和靶向肝细胞的能力。

sentences.sentence: Individual hepatocytes are affected by viral hepatitis.
sentences.translation: 病毒性肝炎单个肝细胞受累。

sentences.sentence: Prussian blue iron stain demonstrates the blue granules of hemosiderin in hepatocytes and Kupffer cells.
sentences.translation: 普鲁士蓝铁染色显示肝细胞和枯否细胞中含铁血黄素的蓝色颗粒。
